id.description: A unique integer value identifying this announcement.

message.description: This dismissable message will be displayed on all pages for authenticated users. It can contain basic html tags, for example https://example.com

style.description:
The style of banner to display. (info, success, warning, danger)

* `info` - Info
* `success` - Success
* `warning` - Warning
* `danger` - Danger

dismissable.title: Dismissable?
dismissable.description: Ticking this box allows users to dismiss the current announcement
